modName: Simultaneously Meltdown Plus Tools and Gold Crafting
summary:
Simultaneously Meltdown Of Ores and scrap to ingots.
Craftable Iron Lockpicks. 
Gold Crafting: (Gold version).
Craftable Tools.
descriptionHtml:
A New Version of Simultaneously Meltdown Added Tools And Gold Crafting to it, Added a Gold Smithing Perk, must have steel smithing and lvl 50 in smithing.
Compatible With All Official DLCÂ´s and Cleaned With TES5Edit to be Compatible as possible with all other mods, Enjoy :) 

Standalone mods here: 
============================= 
* Simultaneously Meltdown:        http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26551 
* Craftable Iron Lockpicks:         http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26698 
* Gold Crafting:                        http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26453 (Septim version) 
* Craftable Tools:                     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26700 
============================= 

Simultaneously Meltdown Of Ores :) 
============================= 
Make 1, 5 ,10,15 or 20 Ingots at the same time, if you got the required raw materials the Melting recipe will appear, the melting recipe will not show on the menu before you got the materials needed to melt. It holds the crafting menu clean by not show the recipes that you do not have the materials to make. Except for the Basic Recipe,(1 ingot recipe) that one is always visible, so if you go to a smelter with enough ore to make 5 ingots, that recipe will be visible to use, when used the recipe disappear again to next time you have enough ores, It is Clean and handy :) 

Craftable Iron Lockpicks: 
============================= 
This is a neat version who has only 1 crafting recipe in the menu that upgrades as you gain smithing perks. To craft them you need Iron ingot and charcoal. The amount of Crafted Lock-picks increases by 5 as you gain level in smithing perks, Max amount is 25 lock-picks. 

Gold Crafting: (Gold version) 
============================= 
allows you to Craft Coins From Gold Ingots, And Melt Down Coins to Gold Ingots at the Smelter. To unlock the Gold crafting, you must have \"Advanced Armors\" Smithing perk achievable at level 50 in smithing. The crafting and melting mod is in 4 levels 
Craft 100, 1000, 2000 and 4000 Coins from Gold ingots. And Melt down Coins to 1, 10, 20 and 40 Gold Ingots at the Smelter. The smelting recipe will only show in menu if You got The Needed Materials to Craft, And the recipe disappear after the materials is used, and appears again when its needed. This is to keep the menu as clean as possible, The Ground Recipe Is always visible. (that 1 ingot thingy) 

Craftable Tools: 
============================= 
Made Pickaxe & WoodCutter\'s Axe Craftable and temperable 


Like the mod? Please Show some love and vote :)
